AboutPage.heading: About Us
AboutPage.description: Our company is engaged in the production and sale of high-quality chipboard (LDSP), medium-density fiberboard (MDF), and countertops.
AboutPage.missionDescription: To provide the market with high-quality materials for furniture production and interior design.
AboutPage.teamDescription: We are professionals in our field, united by a common goal — to create the best for you.

ContactsPage.heading: Contacts
ContactsPage.description: Get in touch with us for more information about our products and services.

NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong
